resources.string: You must grant NureAlarm permission to display over other apps.
NureAlarm receives a list of groups, please wait a moment.
In order to use NureAlarm you need a stable internet connection. Please connect to Wi-Fi or turn on the mobile network.
Failed to get list of groups. You may have a poor internet connection or the cist.nure.ua is not responding.
To start the application, you must specify the alarm setting time and group.
Failed to get list of lessons. You may have a poor internet connection or the cist.nure.ua is not responding.
